description: My favourite thing about making this apple pie is coming up with different designs every time I make it. Best served with vanilla ice cream!
name: Granny Smith Apple Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg granny smith apples, cored and peeled

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix flour and salt until combined. Add in cubed butter and break up into flour with a fork. Mixture will still have lumps.
Gradually add the ice water and continue to mix until the dough starts to come together. You may not need all of the water.
Work the dough together with your hands and turn out onto a prepared surface. Work dough into a ball and cover with cling wrap. Refrigerate for an hour.
Either slice or dice apples. In a bowl, add apples, sugar, flour, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and juice from the lemon. Mix until combined and the apples are coated. Refrigerate.
Preheat oven to 200.C. On a floured surface, cut the pie dough in half and roll out each portion until round and roughly 3mm thick.
Place one portion of pie dough into a pie dish. Pour in apple filling and pat down. Place the other dough portion on top. Trim any extra dough and ensure edges are crimped together.

Brush the pie with the beaten egg and sprinkle a little extra sugar on top. Cut slits in the pie to create a vent, then bake for about 50 minutes or until the crust is golden and cooked. Allow to cool before slicing.
